example.text: I'll always do what’s right for Michigan, even if it means standing up to the President or voting against my party. [[user]]’ veto hurts American workers. We'll never be able to compete globally unless we hold those who violate US trade laws accountable. [[url]]

As we recognize #NationalPoliceWeek, I announced a new bipartisan bill to help mid-Michigan law enforcement agencies better recruit, train & equip officers. We must ensure law enforcement officers have the resources they need to keep our community safe. [[url]]

As we recognize #NationalPoliceWeek, I announced a new bipartisan bill to help mid-Michigan law enforcement agencies better recruit, train & equip officers. We must ensure law enforcement officers have the resources they need to keep our community safe. [[url]]

As a former school board member, I know how hard Michigan teachers work for our students. During #TeacherAppreciationWeek, I want to say thank you to all current & former educators. I'll continue working to bring more federal resources to our classrooms to help students thrive. [[url]]

I'll always do what’s right for Michigan, even if it means standing up to the President or voting against my party. [[user]]’ veto hurts American workers. We'll never be able to compete globally unless we hold those who violate US trade laws accountable. [[url]]

As we recognize #NationalPoliceWeek, I announced a new bipartisan bill to help mid-Michigan law enforcement agencies better recruit, train & equip officers. We must ensure law enforcement officers have the resources they need to keep our community safe. [[url]]
